about_the_game:
Survival and Exploration


You’ll face harsh weather conditions, hunger, and the unforgiving wilderness. As you explore diverse, danger-filled environments in this open world, you must find the food and resources necessary for survival. Nights are deadlier, and weather conditions can be fatal. Build yourself a shelter, manage your resources wisely, and prepare for nature’s wrath.

Looting and Crafting


The world is filled with loot spots that encourage constant exploration and scavenging. From old ruins to abandoned towns and deep wilderness, you’ll find materials that are essential for survival. Use these resources to craft weapons, tools, and shelters, ensuring you stay one step ahead of the dangers around you.

Fishing and Farming


Make use of nature’s resources to secure food. You can fish in ponds and rivers, or start your own farm to grow crops. Over time, you’ll be able to create a sustainable lifestyle, helping you thrive in this challenging world.

Strategic PvP Gameplay


It’s not just nature you have to worry about—other players are one of your biggest threats. You can sneak into their shelters, steal their hard-earned resources, or form strategic alliances to stay ahead. But remember, they’re always watching and waiting for a chance to disrupt your plans and steal from you.

Hidden Threats


In this world, it’s not just hunger and nature that pose a challenge. There are unknown enemies lurking in the shadows, waiting to strike. While they might not be zombies or cannibals, they are dangerous beings that will test your survival skills. Stay vigilant and prepare for what’s hidden in the dark.

content_descriptors.notes: In Lost Zone Survival, the game character has optional alcohol consumption. It is possible to use weapons and explosives. May contain light nudity.

name: Lost Zone: Survival

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660, Radeon RX 460 or equivalent with 2 GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 970, Radeon RX 580 or equivalent with 4GB of video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible

short_description: Lost Zone: Survival ,Survive in a vast open world by battling harsh conditions, hunger, and unknown threats. Explore with friends, gather resources, fish, farm, and craft tools to stay alive. Beware of other players who can steal your hard-earned loot. Only the strongest will survive!
supported_languages: English, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish
